subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: While the faces of the United States soccer players — and their fans — did not have much color after Sunday’s tie, there is still much life left in this team.
snippet: While the faces of the United States soccer players — and their fans — did not have much color after Sunday’s tie, there is still much life left in this team.
